cyclone.name: JERRY
cyclone.trajectory: Turning northeast then east-northeast, moving over the western Atlantic toward Bermuda and away from the Caribbean
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Bermuda (close pass rather than direct landfall)

weather_observation.warning_coast: Bermuda coastline under Tropical Storm Warning
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Swells affecting the northern Leeward Islands and Puerto Rico coastlines
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at San Juan; only occasional breezy conditions possible.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Long-period swells may cause minor coastal flooding and dangerous rip currents.
weather_observation.rainfall: Little to no significant rainfall expected (generally below 1 inch).
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and rip currents hazardous to small craft operations near the harbor entrance.
